au_1183076: ffmpeg -framerate 25 -i %03d.png output.avi

ffmpeg -framerate 25 -pattern_type glob -i "*.png" output.avi

cat $(find . -maxdepth 1 -name "*.png" | sort -V) | ffmpeg -framerate 25 -i - output.avi

au_620793: for f in *.flac , *.m4a , *.ogg ; do ffmpeg -i "$f" -ab 320k "${f%.m4a}.mp3"; done

do ffmpeg -i "$f" -ab 320k "${f%.flac}.mp3";

ul_278365: ffmpeg -i ${vidfile} 2>&1 | grep Duration | cut -d ' ' -f 4 | sed s/,//

l=$(ffmpeg -i ${vidfile} 2>&1 | grep Duration | cut -d ' ' -f 4 | sed s/,//)
h=$(echo $l|cut -d: -f1)
m=$(echo $l|cut -d: -f2)
s=$(echo $l|cut -d: -f3|cut -d"." -f1)
(( hh=$h*3600 ))
(( mm=$m*60 ))
(( LengthSeconds=$hh+$mm+$s ))

au_1293748: for i in some-series-of-names-*.mp4; do echo ${i%%.*}; ffmpeg -i ${i%%.*}.mp4 -i some-logo.png -filter_complex "[0:v][1:v]overlay=main_w-overlay_w-10:10,subtitles=${i%%.*}.srt" -codec:a copy -s hd720 ${i%%.*}-ubuntu.mp4; done

for %i in (some-series-of-names-*.mp4) do echo %~ni.mp4 && ffmpeg -i %~ni.mp4 -i some-logo.png -filter_complex "[0:v][1:v]overlay=main_w-overlay_w-10:10,subtitles=%~ni.srt" -codec:a copy -s hd720 %~ni-windows.mp4
